paper_title: Specialist Discussion Meeting: 3D structure of the flare chromosphere
abstract: David Kuridze, Lyndsay Fletcher and Hugh Hudson report on the RAS Specialist Discussion Meeting '3D Structure of the Flare Chromosphere'.
